rows.label: qev025705_MSG0001
rows.name:
Go ask my friends around the city for their sizes,
all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0002
rows.name:
For juniors, talk to Veverta. For misses, see Aalis.
And for the older woman, ask Vyponne. Okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0003
rows.name: Well? Were you able to get those measurements?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0004
rows.name:
Great! Next we need the materials, don't we?
Five pieces of supple leather should be enough,
shouldn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0005
rows.name:
You have everything, do you? Then please give those
measurements and the supple leather to Victoria,
all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0006
rows.name:
My favorite smells are...hmmm? Well, mondcherries
and sona herbs both melt my heart in a non-fatal way,
I suppose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0007
rows.name:
Oh! It smells like you have something good on you,
doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0008
rows.name:
Which ingredient do you think would make the best
perfume?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0009
rows.name:
*sniff* *sniff* Ooooh! That is LOVELY, isn't it?
So so great, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0010
rows.name: Here, let me take a whiff...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0011
rows.name: *sniff* Oh my! It certainly is...pungent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0012
rows.name:
I could see it playing well with wild girls like you,
Panyar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0013
rows.name:
But yes, I think it's a fine choice. How about you?
Do you think wild is a good direction to take?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025705_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that a feral scent gets your heart pumping.

rows.label: qev025705_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025705_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain that you prefer a more relaxing aroma.

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0014
rows.name:
Mmm, I'm glad to hear that.
I expect it'll be a hit with BLADEs like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yes, I can see how someone in your stressful line of
work would look for peace where they can find it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0016
rows.name:
Though I do think there's demand out there for this.
Some people are just thrill seekers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'll contact production and tell them to get started.
Oh, and here—this is for all your hard work.
Thanks for the help, and for being so flexible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0018
rows.name:
*sniff* *sniff* Ooooh! That is LOVELY, isn't it?
Just great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0019
rows.name: Here, let me take a whiff...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0020
rows.name: Mmm, it's sweet. Almost...calming. I like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0021
rows.name:
Though I'm a bit surprised you agree, Panyar.
I thought you would have gone for something edgier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'm a sensitive girl on the inside, Victoria!
Here, friend—why don't you have a sniff as well?
It's quite calming, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev025705_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell them the warm scent is comforting.

rows.label: qev025705_JNK0050
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev025705_SEL0051
rows.name: Explain that you prefer a wilder scent.

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0023
rows.name:
Hmm. I could see this going over well with battle-weary
BLADEs. A little pick-me-up, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0024
rows.name:
Well, I suppose BLADEs are used to more intense
stimulation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0025
rows.name:
Though I do think there's a market for this.
After all, there's always someone looking for a little
comfort in their day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025705_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'll contact production and tell them to get started.
Oh, and here—this is for all your hard work.
Thanks for the help, and for being so flexible.[ST:wait ]
